name: Primus Demo
description:
The first playable demo for Primus. 

If you're on windows 64 then use PrimusForWin64.zip. 

If you're running a Mac then download PrimusMac.zip.

If you have Linux use PrimusLinux64.

The game is still in early development so if you're having trouble launching or running the game please leave a comment to indicate your OS and the version of the demo that you downloaded. 

You can always try to run Primus.jar with your own java version if you want but the OS-specific version is recommended.

If you want to follow the development of the game and get updates about it you can follow us on Twitter @cigeea. 

https://twitter.com/Cigeea
